about_the_game:
In a distant kingdom, a young monk dedicates himself to training to become a powerful wizard. However, evil monsters begin to haunt his peaceful land. Now, he must embark on a journey and face unimaginable dangers to uncover the origin of the evil.

SHOOT LIGHT AGAINST STRUCTURES AND MONSTERS

You can deal damage to monsters or interact with structures by shooting at them with your light shot.

MOVE QUICKLY BETWEEN WHITE FLAMES USING TELEPORT

By pressing the right mouse button you will be instantly transported to the white flame.

INTERACT WITH SPELLS OF DIFFERENT COLORS

Blue spells were cast by allies while the reds were cast by enemies. Discover the function of each spell during the journey.
